text: Imagine a vast sheet of paper on which straight Lines. Triangles: Squares: Pentagons Hexagons. and other figures: instead of remaining fixed in their places. move freely about. On 01in the surface but without the power of rising above Or sinking below it. very much like shadows only hard and with luminous and you will then have a pretty correct notion of my country and countrymen. Alas. a few years ag0 I should have said universe but nOw my mind has been opened to higher views of things.
